meanings.definition: Corrected or revised for errors or mistakes.
meanings.sent1: The emendated document was now free of errors.
meanings.sent2: The emendated essay received a higher grade after corrections.
meanings.sent3: The emendated report made the teacher smile with relief.
meanings.sent4: Her emendated drawing was a masterpiece of perfection.
meanings.sent5: The emendated map guided them accurately through the forest.

meanings.definition: Improved or refined by making corrections.
meanings.sent1: The emendated version of the recipe tasted much better.
meanings.sent2: The emendated design caught the attention of many customers.
meanings.sent3: His emendated speech was a hit at the conference.
meanings.sent4: The emendated plan brought success beyond their expectations.
meanings.sent5: The emendated outfit made her feel confident and stylish.
